Our farm families export billions of dollars in agricultural products to Canada and Mexico each year.  Now they will be able to export even more. It’s time for Congress to ratify #USMCAnow and deliver a major trade win for the economy and the American worker.

President Trump ran on the promise of renegotiating NAFTA to make it better. #USMCA does that and more. It will be a significant boost to our already-roaring economy, and it’s particularly welcome news for the thousands of struggling North Carolina farm families.
